Hello. .
feel free to post your opinions, and I'm okay with all allegations. I know this would pop up someday, that's the reason why I'm replying to the comment. I've been adding a watermark in the video and you can notice it @ right bottom part of the screen. 
Yify is a good friend of mine, and we are on the same boat. I respect him as a fellow pirate and as a human being. He uses 1080p sources and has a good team. My connection isn't that good. So I had to rely on 720ps for my 480ps sometime. I often get file from my friends, too.
 Yify has his own space in our community and I dont' want our comment section to be bleak bleek :)
And I'm no one to ask you not to comment. It's just my opinion. 
Be nice friends. God bless. . :)
